Posts.Content: I too have a lotof pain in and around my shoulder. I had a lumpectomy in 2000 on my rifht breast, I had rsdiation and had taken temoxiphen for 2 yrs and I was on femsra 6 1/2 yrs.  Hurt all over..now 16 years later under arm and shoulder pain tolerable.  BIG HINT..I moaned at nite while my fingers started to invert toward my palms, hurt joints all over. My brother, a chiropractor. .suggest glucosamine and chondroitant with MSM..I took every day..took about a month to really get in my system...it was like a miracle, could open my hands, walk better...the difference was so noticeable...I highly recommend. .good luck..takes courage., God bless.
Posts.Title: Newbie needs info
